name: 柯俊宏
objective: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This course will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Demonstration.
schedule:
9/14 Introduction to Medical Lasers)
9/21 Laser Physics)
9/28 Laser Safety Standards)
10/5 Laser in Medical Applications with a special lecture from a laser dentist)
10/12 Laser Assisted in Cosmetics)
10/19 Laser-Tissue-Interaction)
10/26 Laser-Tissue Photo-BioModulation)
11/2 Laser in Periodontology)
11/9 Mid-term Examination)
11/16 Laser in Medical Applications with a special lecture from a laser dentist)
11/23 Laser Assisted Implantology)
11/30 Laser in Oral Surgery)
12/7 Laser Assisted Bleaching)
12/14 Low Level Laser Therapy and Laser Acupuncture)
12/21 Laser Hands-on and Final Report)
12/28 Laser Hands-on and Final Report)
1/4 Laser Hands-on and Final Report)
1/11 Final Examination)
scorePolicy:

remarks: 1.
